original_title:
You abused your security clearance by bad mouthing the President while having your clearance. You have been badmouthing him for years. 

Now you don’t have a clearance. You signed the 2019 letter. Everything I said is accurate. 

Enjoy losing your Kentucky Senate race too, loser.  — The Donald
article_summary: Laura Loomer accused Joel Willett of abusing a security clearance to badmouth the President, but Willett denies having a security clearance in 2019. The accuracy of Loomer's claims is disputed, with some users supporting her and others questioning her credibility.</s>
